title: 16A.723 GOVERNOR'S RESIDENCE; REIMBURSEMENT OF EXPENSES.
text:
The commissioner may establish procedures to accept funds for reimbursement of expenditures at the governor's residence.
The reimbursements collected under subdivision 1 are appropriated for payment of residence expenses, including dry cleaning, carpet cleaning, and the repair and replacement of household equipment and supplies used for events conducted at the governor's residence.
